content: Yes, overall we're generally optimistic things are going to get better in the second-half of 2022 for both those sectors, Senior Living as well as Hotels, if I had to put my thumb up in the air and decide which one was going to get better faster, I'm a little more optimistic that the hotels can come back faster and may come back faster, we're pretty, we're fairly optimistic that hotel business travel may rebound better than people think as we enter the second and third quarters and especially in the second-half of the year, and that's sort of informed by two data points that we have been able to observe over the last couple years.
